title: Power Naps Can Keep Your Brain from Shrinking: Study
description: UK Biobank data reveals daytime napping may be essential to improved reaction time and memory in middle-aged adults.

title: Bitwise executive confirms ETF received $400 of unsolicited Bitcoin
description:
A top Bitwise executive acknowledged on Jan. 26 that his firm’s spot Bitcoin ETF has received hundreds of dollars of unsolicited Bitcoin. Co-founder & CTO Hong Kim wrote that the Bitwise Bitcoin ETF (BITB) received 998,085 satoshis worth $419 across 35 UTXOs over two days. He suggested that this will simply increase the ETF’s value, […]

The post Bitwise executive confirms ETF received $400 of unsolicited Bitcoin appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: ‘When Did We Become the Sugar Daddy of the World’, Asks U.S. Senator Rand Paul
description: U.S. Senator Rand Paul, in his recent interview on Fox Business, provided a critical overview of the United States’ role in global financial aid and its policies on border security and foreign aid. title: Gala MUSIC Launches on LBank Exchange: A New Era in Music Streaming and Blockchain Technology
description: PRESS RELEASE. title: SOL, OP, SAND, ADA, ETH Spice Up Altcoin Market… Details Here
description:
Altcoins like Solana (SOL), Optimism (OP), The Sandbox (SAND), Cardano (ADA), and Ether (ETH) made notable recoveries in the last 24 hours, data from CoinMarketCap showed. These numerous climbs brought a halt to the long week of widespread declines. SOL changed hands at $91.14 as of this writing, indicating a 4.62% increase. OP’s price reclaimed […]

The post SOL, OP, SAND, ADA, ETH Spice Up Altcoin Market… Details Here appeared first on Coin Edition.
